pbp.last: Randy Arozarena pops out to third baseman Cristhian Adames.
Kevin Kramer called out on strikes.
Shane Robinson grounds into a force out, shortstop Luis Guillorme to second baseman Jose Reyes.   Estevan Florial out at 2nd.

away.radio: WDAE 620 AM /95.3 FM, Rays Radio Network

pbp.last: J.  P.   Crawford grounds out softly, second baseman Nick Solak to first baseman Johnny Monell.

game.description: Radio broadcast to WJFK 1580 AM when Caps start.
game.venue: The Ballpark of the Palm Beaches

pbp.last: Francisco Cervelli grounds into a force out, shortstop Engelb Vielma to second baseman Ruben Tejada.   Casey Hughston out at 2nd.
Ryan Braun doubles (1) on a line drive to center fielder Noel Cuevas.   Lorenzo Cain scores.
With Nick Hundley batting, wild pitch by Parker Bridwell, Joe Panik scores.

away.radio: 95.7 FM The Game, A's Radio Net

pbp.last: Nomar Mazara reaches on a fielding error by center fielder Jake Smolinski.   Nomar Mazara to 2nd.
Carlos Asuaje singles on a line drive to right fielder Tyler Naquin.
A.  J.   Pollock strikes out swinging.

game.venue: Salt River Fields at Talking Stick

pbp.last: Mike Trout singles on a fly ball to center fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
